T

transform(String) - Method in class de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.ClassTransformer
Search for class files on the passed directory, load each one as CtClass, filter the valid candidates (using #filter(CtClass)) and apply transformation to each one (ClassTransformer.applyTransformations(CtClass)).
transform(String, String) - Method in class de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.ClassTransformer
Search for class files on the passed input directory, load each one as CtClass, filter the valid candidates (using #filter(CtClass)) and apply transformation to each one (ClassTransformer.applyTransformations(CtClass)).
transform(String, String, Iterator<String>) - Method in class de.icongmbh.oss.maven.plugin.javassist.ClassTransformer
Use the passed className iterator, load each one as CtClass, filter the valid candidates (using #filter(CtClass)) and apply transformation to each one (ClassTransformer.applyTransformations(CtClass)).
